column4: I have a question about the synaptic package manager; I see how to install and uninstall apps, can you use it to upgrade to new versions.  I have FireFox 1.5x and want to know if I can use the package manager to upgrade FireFox to 2.x.  Is that possible
pmt: where do i configure it to do that
Ubuntu should pickup that you are running an old version of FireFox and pickup and tell you it has an upgrade.
Thanks I thought it should work that way, but I am still running the old version.  I'll check it out
